content: Can I work on #2305 (https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/2305), not sure as a PR has not been merged though that had been successfully reviewed. If their possibility to work on it then guide me how can I proceed.
After reading the comments on the issue, seems like we already tried it and it didn't go well as per the user experience
@Anshal Shukla @Siddharth Yeah, I went ahead and closed this issue. Some of the really old issues that we have are likely to either be obsolete or difficult to implement.
